column1: '''John David Ruemmler''' is an American author of role-playing games. In the 1980s
column2: Ruemmler worked as Production Manager for [[Iron Crown Enterprises]]
column3: contributing as author and editor to many products relating to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].<ref>''Iron Crown Quarterly''

column1: *[[1988]]: ''[[Mines of Moria (Middle-earth Quest book)|Mines of Moria]]'' (with Susan Mathews)
